context.p: You have finally received your product from Meble kolonialne24, but unfortunately it is damaged? No problem! Our team will take care of your concerns. In the video and study case below we explain how exactly it works.

p.note: Our team in the warehouse thoroughly prepars the items to transport. Quality assurance employess are checking each item before shipping to reject furniture damaged during the transport from India.

context.note: When the weight of the package is above 30 kg such delivery is packed on a wooden pallet to protect it from damage during the delivery to your home. Our workers wrapp in bubble foil, protect each corner with sponge protectors and packed in carton every item.
context.p: Anna has ordered a chest in our e-shop and chosen a shipping company to deliver it to her home.

step.cmd: She has received an sms with the phone number to the driver and the information that he will deliver her the chest today . She has called the courier end established with him the details of the delivery.

The courier has left her the chest on the driveway. Anna has checked the package and found a visible damage. She confirmed the receipt and required to unpack the item in presence of the courier. It appeared that the corner of the chest is crushed so she draw up a statement of damage where she described the flaw and marked all used protections.
